title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Constructivist Pedagogical Workshops Integrating Design Thinking and Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three writing techniques (design journaling, reflective essays, peer review) to practical tasks.
Learners can analyze problems occurring at each stage of the design process through technical writing and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can perform collaborative writing to refine scientific design solutions through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
